name: Three Sons
description:
A world blanketed by endless snow...

A neverending war, a land terrorised by bandits, the world has known only darkness since the great God DEUS gave his own life to defeat THE BLACK KNIGHT.

Features



  • A dark, story heavy adventure: 4 - 5 hours of gameplay.
  • A Stylised 2D art style: Heavily inspired by paper craft
  • Multiple POVs: Experience the story from the perspective of 3 main characters plus many more side characters.
  • Countless choices to make: And multiple endings based on the choices you make

Before You Play



While inspired by many classic JRPG's and created in RPG Maker the game is a combatless experience focusing instead on choices and dialogue.

Dark themes, strong language and violence are common. If this is not something you are comfortable with this game may not be for you.
